name: Octadesk
description:
Octadesk is a conversational service platform for sales, and support teams. To increase revenue, decrease costs, and drive a better experience for your customers.

Messaging: to communicate with customers via a variety of channels, including email, social media and chat, giving a seamless and consistent experience across all of them.
Ticket Management: to organize and prioritize customer inquiries. 
Chatbots and others automation: to automate certain tasks, save time and improve efficiency.
Reporting and Analytics: to track key metrics such as customer satisfaction, response times, and ticket volume. This helps to identify areas for improvement and make data-driven decisions.
focus_areas: Messaging / Chatbots and automation / Conversational Marketing
Reports and Dashboards / Sales acceleration / Customer experience
